formula: a(n) = n!*(n!-1). - _Mark van Hoeij_, May 13 2013a(n) = A000142(n)*(A000142(n-1). - _Michel Marcus_, Apr 15 2015
prog: (PARI) vector(20, n, n--; (n!)^2-n!) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 15 2015(MAGMA) [Factorial(n)*(Factorial(n)-1): n in [0..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 15 2015
